about.title: About Me
text: Hi! I'm Daniele and I'm a frontend developer since 2009, I am specialized in the use of PHP (Symfony), JavaScript (jQuery, Vue, Angular), CSS3 (SCSS, SASS).

I'm in love with the Javascript/Typescript languages and therefore I am specializing in the use of Vue frameworks (for example this site), Angular, Svelte and React (although I must admit that I don't like it very much).

items.name: Web Developer
items.text: Development of websites using the Symfony framework or CMS Drupal, depending on the needs I take care of the front-end developments (assembly and dynamization of the theme) and / or back-end (web service management, database queries etc ... ).
